resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aea-fea8-441d-2d43-aae0c57e71a4#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Képes Krónika.</string>
            <string language="en">Illustrated Chronicle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erläuterte Chronik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chronique Illustrée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chronicle Ilustrado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chronicle Illustrato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διευκρινισμένος εξιστορήστε κατά γράμμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Chronicle Ilustrado</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Szent László megalapítja a nagyváradi szlkesegyházat, követeket fogad.</string>
            <string language="en">Saint Leslie founds the Cathedral of Nagyvárad, greets ambassadors.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">I. (Nagy) Lajos,  Képes Krónika,  Kálti Márk,  iniciálé,  illumináció,  ornamentális,  nagyváradi székesegyház,  Szent László király,  angyal,  Körös,  keresztes hadjárat,  </string>
            <string language="en">(Great) Louis I., Illustrated Chronocle, Mark Kálti, initial, illumination, ornamental, cathedral of Nagyvárad, King Saint Leslie, angel, Körös, crusade,</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heiliger Leslie gründet die Kathedrale von 
Nagyvárad, grüßt Botschafter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Saint Leslie fonde la cathédrale de Nagyvárad, 
salue des ambassadeurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Saint Leslie funda a catedral de Nagyvárad, 
cumprimenta embaixadores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">San Leslie fonda la cattedrale di Nagyvárad, 
greets gli ambasciatori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγιος Leslie ιδρύει τον καθεδρικό ναό 
Nagyvαrad, χαιρετά τους πρεσβευτές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Santo Leslie funda la catedral de Nagyvárad, 
saluda a embajadores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">(großer) Louis I., erläutertes Chronocle, Markierung Kálti, 
Initiale, Ablichtung, dekorativ, Kathedrale von Nagyvárad, König 
Heiliges Leslie, Engel, Körös, Kreuzzug,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">(grand) Louis I., Chronocle illustré, marque Kálti, initiale, 
illumination, ornementale, cathédrale de Nagyvárad, le Roi Saint 
Leslie, ange, Körös, croisade,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Louis (grande) I., Chronocle ilustrado, marca Kálti, inicial, 
iluminação, ornamental, catedral de Nagyvárad, rei Saint Leslie, 
angel, Körös, crusade,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Louis I. (grande), Chronocle illustrato, contrassegno Kálti, 
iniziale, illuminazione, ornamentale, cattedrale di Nagyvárad, re San
Leslie, angelo, Körös, crusade,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">(Ο μεγάλος) Louis I., διευκρινισμένο Chronocle, 
Mark Kαlti, αρχικό, φωτισμός, διακοσμητικός, καθεδρικός 
ναός Nagyvαrad, βασιλιάς Αγιος Leslie, άγγελος, Kφrφs,
σταυροφορία,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">(gran) Louis I., Chronocle ilustrado, marca Kálti, inicial, 
iluminación, ornamental, catedral de Nagyvárad, rey Santo Leslie, 
ángel, Körös, cruzada,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            </role>

end:vcard</entity>

        </lifeCycle>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
